str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Near. From a primary verb agcho; near.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
And, even, also, namely.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
